body_html: Thank you @concretevitamin and @vincentvanhoucke. Do you think this issue should be closed? If it turns out that somebody needs this to be placed on GPU it could be reopened. (I briefly thought of taking a stab at it but a bit time-limited right now). Apart from that it serves as a reference if anybody else encounters it.

body: Thank you @concretevitamin and @vincentvanhoucke. Do you think this issue should be closed? If it turns out that somebody needs this to be placed on GPU it could be reopened. (I briefly thought of taking a stab at it but a bit time-limited right now). Apart from that it serves as a reference if anybody else encounters it.
